dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1405 IS: Medicare Ambulance Access Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schumer (for himself, Mr. Roberts, Mr. Leahy, and Ms. Landrieu) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for an extension of certain ambulance add-on payments under the Medicare program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Medicare Ambulance Access Act of 2013.

section.header: Extension of certain ambulance add-on payments

subsection.text: Section 1834(l)(13)(A) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395m(l)(13)(A)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking January 1, 2014 and inserting January 1, 2019; and
in each of clauses (i) and (ii), by striking January 1, 2014 and inserting January 1, 2019 each place it appears.

subsection.text: Section 1834(l)(12)(A) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395m(l)(12)(A)) is amended in the first sentence by striking January 1, 2014 and inserting January 1, 2019.
